oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Capt. Edward W. Easley, Co. I, 24th Tenn. Vol. Regt., CSA, to his wife
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to his wife apprising her of conditions in camp with Gen. Albert Sidney Johnston's Confederate army in Kentucky and inviting her to come visit. Johnston had attempted to establish a defensive position around Bowling Green to thwart an anticipated Union invasion of Tennessee.
